name: Bumble Bea - Global Game Jam 2018
description:
Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2018

Your hive is at the far side of the park, but the park is filled with humans. And humans are the worst! 

Obviously the only way to get past is to cleverly disguise yourself as  one of them. Stick together to maintain the human persona Bea, and avoid loud humans who cause your bees to flee in fear!

---

HOW TO PLAY

Ideally 2 - 3 players unless you can mash the keyboard with your toes??

Head: I J K L

Body: UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT

Legs: W A S D

Restart: R

Keep together or the humans will discover you're actually a bunch of bees!

---
